mapper.insert: insert into board(title, writer, content, siName, category) values(#{title}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{siName}, #{category})
mapper.select: select b.bId, title, writer, siName ,regAt, modAt, category, hit, count(bl.bId) as likeCnt from board b left join boardLike bl on b.bId = bl.bId where writer = #{email} group by b.bId
select b.*, count(bl.bId) as likeCnt from board b left join boardLike bl on b.bId = bl.bId where b.bId = #{bId} group by b.bId
select b.bId from board b left join boardLike bl on b.bId = bl.bId where b.bId > 10 limit 1
select b.bId from board b left join boardLike bl on b.bId = bl.bId where b.bId < 10 order by bId desc limit 1
mapper.update: update board set hit = (hit + 1) where bId = #{bId}

update board set
title = #{title},
content = #{content},
category = #{category},
modAt = now() where bId = #{bId}
mapper.delete: delete from boardLike where bId = #{bId} and email = #{email}
